abstract: A judge in Los Angeles said he would not allow the actor to prevent lawyers from disclosing aspects of his paternity case to the news media or otherwise seal documents, but he agreed to seal depositions.
snippet: A judge in Los Angeles said he would not allow the actor to prevent lawyers from disclosing aspects of his paternity case to the news media or otherwise seal documents, but he agreed to seal depositions.
lead_paragraph: 8:23 p.m. | Updated A state court judge in Los Angeles denied Mel Gibson’s request for a broad gag order closing off access to information from the paternity action involving himself and Oksana Grigorieva, a lawyer representing Ms. Grigorieva said.

headline.main: Judge in Mel Gibson Case Denies Gag Order
